Desian:
Hush! Be quiet! I'm listening to the whispers of the flames. I feel like I'm close to tears from their warm whisper. It is heard so clearly if you bring your ear a bit closer. Others just don't know how to listen...
Hm... It seems like I have been immersed in contemplation for too long. What do you want?
